message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, Bob!
You're starting strong, but I'm looking for a better deal!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away too much!
You're not giving me enough, I'll have to make a strong counteroffer!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm still not going to give away too much!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not going to give away too much more, but I'll make one more offer!
I'm running out of time, but I'm not going to settle for peanuts!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
You're not getting any more from me, I'm taking what I can get!
I'm not going to give in, I want the best deal!
I'm not leaving with nothing, I'll take what's left!
